context.description: Create a database definition file Use this page to specify basic information about the data design project that contains the database definition. The name of the database definition file is automatically assigned according to the database that you want to connect to. If a data definition is not migrated, check that the selected database type and version is supported.

topic.label: Adding database definitions to the IBM Integration Toolkit
Adding a database as a source or target

context.description: Database Definition Migration Click Yes to continue with the migration of database definition files.

topic.label: Migrating a flow containing data definitions
